## RecommendedHandPoseProbabilityThresholds variable

Recommended thresholds for probabilities reported in [IPoseProbabilities](./yoha.iposeprobabilities.md)<!-- -->, [ITrackResult.isLeftHandProb](./yoha.itrackresult.islefthandprob.md) and [ITrackResult.isHandPresentProb](./yoha.itrackresult.ishandpresentprob.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
RecommendedHandPoseProbabilityThresholds: {
    PINCH: number;
    FIST: number;
    IS_HAND_PRESENT: number;
    IS_LEFT_HAND: number;
}
```
